bioconda.name: bioconductor-a4preproc
bioconda.summary: Automated Affymetrix Array Analysis Preprocessing Package

biotools.summary: An R package of the "a4" packages collection. It is used for microarray data preprocessing where annotation information is added to experimental result data.

bioschemas.name: a4Preproc
bioschemas.summary: An R package of the "a4" packages collection. It is used for microarray data preprocessing where annotation information is added to experimental result data.
